name: Bugged Bunny
description: An over-scoped game with "intentional"  bugs. I made this game in a week with about 18 dev hours. I tried focusing on art and visuals for this jam(Brackeys 2021.1), which you can see I have done "very" well.... sort of. This is my first WebGl project, so I'm somewhat proud, and it's got all the good stuff - ear rape, ugly art, invisible box colliders and much much more. try it out and tell me what you think.  :')
